scripts.dev:site: pnpm run build:components && pnpm run --filter 'tdesign-site' dev
scripts.build:components: pnpm run --filter 'tdesign-site-components' build && pnpm run --filter 'tdesign-site-components' postbuild
scripts.site: npm run build:components && cd site && npm run build
scripts.site:intranet: npm run build:components && cd site && vite build --mode intranet
